thread.section_title: Stickerkid Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Stickerkid | www.stickerkid.com
thread.title: Customer John P.
thread.title_full: Stickerkid bewertet von Customer John P.

author: Customer John P.
title: Customer John P.
text: I work at an industrial plant and I use their iron on labels/stickers on my shirts. They are very durable for the application that I use them for. I would order them again without hesitation. It is winter here and only 70-80 degrees F in the daytime. They have held up fine on my Red Cap or Red Kap industrial shirts.
